Text: Dons November issue of NextCard NewsIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Dear Don The holiday season seems to begin earlier and become more hectic every year This year make it simpler Skip the malls the crowds and the hassles by doing your shopping online NextCard can help with tools that let you comparison shop online ways to make sure you shop safely and a few tips that are sure to make your holidays brighter
